name: Email-verifier
tagline: Validates emails, including cross-checking TLD with ICANN
body:
# Email-Verifier Validates emails, including cross-checking TLD with ICANN To use, simply add this in your header: ````JS ```` To validate an email using JavaScript, use: ````JS if (validateEmail(yourtextbox.value)) //Valid Email ```` A simple demo that alerts the user whether the email is ````Valid```` or ````Invalid````: ````JS alert((validateEmail(yourtextbox.value)?"V":"Inv")+"alid"); ````
Some example valid email addresses:
foo.bar@gmail.comStandard email
booo000oood@yahoo.jpJapan TLD
boss@nick.digitalDIGITAL TLD
w@yxz.usUS TLD
Some example invalid email addresses:
extra-dot@typo..comTouching ..
wrong@tld.yippyInvalid TLD
starwars-at-at@@rocks.coTouching @@
fail.@fail.failTouching .@
